abstract: Ken Johnson reviews exhibit of sculptures and video works by artist Sanford Biggers at the Brooklyn Museum and SculptureCenter.
snippet: Sanford Biggers mixes mediums including sound and video, sculpture and light, to express his messages.
lead_paragraph: Sanford Biggers mixes mediums including sound and video, sculpture and light, to express his messages.

headline.main: Smile and Metaphor, Crossing Borough Lines
headline.print_headline: Smile and Metaphor, Crossing Borough Lines
headline.seo: Sanford Biggers’s Art in a Two-Borough Exhibition
